products.title: Luna Blackout Beige - Silver Frame Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.metadescription: Luna blackout beige - silver frame velux keylite fakro dakstra in cream. Made to measure from 19.00 with free uk mainland delivery. This velux keylite fakro dakstra includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their luna blackout roof blinds come in 8 colour options - a great way for you to upgrade your skylight window at a value cost. 
 
This option comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework. 
 
This fabric has an acrylic coating backing and provides up to 20% heat loss reduction.
 
 Product id: db-srb0043 fabric colour: beige material: 100% polyester lining: white backing headrail: 53mm deep cassette & 30mm wide side channels   energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.productdescription:
The splash beige light filtering skylight blind is a light, natural looking colour for your skylight window. The blind comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework which is also available in a white colour. Their skylight blinds also have the option to include a control rod for those more difficult to reach windows. As with all their made to measure products this blind will come with a 5 year guarantee for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Roller, 1086 Beige - VELUX Loft Blind
products.metadescription: Roller, 1086 beige - velux loft blind softens the incoming light.Offers both privacy and good looks.Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system.Fully integrated into the roof window.For an additional charg
products.productdescription: Softens the incoming light.Offers both privacy and good looks.Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system.Fully integrated into the roof window.For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience! The solar-rechargeable battery holds enough charge for up to 600 operations, even if there is no direct sunlight for recharging. Please note that the wall mounted control can also be used as a free standing remote control or if necessary, the blind can also be operated manually.

products.title: Beige (1155)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure beige (1155) velux energy blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality velux energy blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
The velux energy blinds offers variable blackout and an insulation effect of up to 19%. The double-pleated blackout cloth has an aluminium honeycomb structure within for significantly improved insulation. Energy blinds are not fixed at the top of the bottom, so you can position them exactly where you need them for light control and privacy.

 	Blackout effect.
 	Flexible and stepless positioning.
 	Improved insulation.
 	Sleek design - no visible cords.
 	Installs in minutes.
 	12 colour choices.
